name: Obscured.AptWatcher
description: Obscured.AptWatcher is a simple Sinatra app that helps you keep track of packages that need updating on your servers.

USER_CONFIRMATION.description: Specifies if an account needs to be confirmed before accessing the service (default: false)

USER_REGISTRATION.description: Specifies if registration is possible, this should only be turned on if the service is only reachable from an intranet (default: false)

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The username for the default administrator

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The password for the default administrator

API_USERNAME.description: The username to use for HTTP Basic authentication accessing the API (default: user)

API_PASSWORD.description: The password to use for HTTP Basic authentication accessing the API (default: password)

SLACK_USER.description: The Slack user to use in notifications (default: AptWatcher)

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The Slack channel to post notifications in

SLACK_ICON.description: The Slack icon to use in notifications (default: :slack:)

SENDGRID_DOMAIN.description: The domain used as sender address, when sending mail

SENDGRID_SERVER.description: The server used when sending mail (default: smtp.sendgrid.net)

SENDGRID_PORT.description: The server port used when sending mail (default: 587)

SENDGRID_USERNAME.description: The username used to authenticate against the mail-server, when sending mail

SENDGRID_PASSWORD.description: The password used to authenticate against the mail-server, when sending mail
